code: import axios from'./index';export var createNewUser=function createNewUser(fullname,job,department,email,phone){return axios.post('/users',{fullname:fullname,job:job,department:department,email:email,phone:phone});};export var getListUser=function getListUser(){return axios.get("/users");};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(id){return axios.delete("/users/".concat(id));};export var getDetialUser=function getDetialUser(id){return axios.get("/users/".concat(id));};export var updateUserDetail=function updateUserDetail(id,fullname,department,job,phone,email){return axios.put("/users/".concat(id),{fullname:fullname,job:job,department:department,email:email,phone:phone});};export var loginUser=function loginUser(email,password){return axios.post("/users/login",{email:email,password:password});};
